hey guys this was posted on the 13. in the comments of the original post on facebook by rumsod: Sorry for the delay, Bloc will be up by Sunday at the latest, likely earlier. So it will hopefully be up by tomorrow if all goes to plan.

aww yea.

Hope my nation is doing good
*drumroll because I'm anxious*

hey guys this was just posted: All data except for custom flags/portraits was saved, so you will be able to go back to your nations until the reset. It will be blocgame.com, but bloc.name will redirect soon.
Well, the bloc site is back up (on blocgame.com), but you can't do anything yet....
...and IT'S BACK UP! (blocgame.com)
...am I a bad person for looting players that are no longer there?
Its sad that my chemical weapons are gone as well as my 100k troops with elite training equipped with almost modern tech. Looks like i have to earn it back

The second I log on, I find myself in a war with someone.

What.
...you probably have the stock flag still... so every one that is active is attacking every one that left
The United States of Kerbin is back ,and has joined the KSP alliance.My goals now is to rebuild my economy ,and drill for oil.

I got oil! i discovered ~200 Mbbls of oil! though its gonna run out soon and the next exploration cost is 4k

Also im at war with someone and i cant launch an offensive?

Kethane Nation is back in operation, but I need to fix my people's quality of life...

EDIT: And since when did I have Second World War Surplus? I remember before the crash I have First World War Surplus...

EDIT 2: OK, I had $5,000,000,000 to start with. I paid a lot for oil exploration (814 Mbbl) and 2 oil drills, as well as improving the people's living standards...

Edited November 24, 2013 by Designer225
Stupid game, wouldnt register on any of my email accounts before the off line, and now its link to register 404's.. anyone got a link that not 404ing link http://blocgame.com/register.php ?
>BLOC is still in Beta, so I'm sure Rumsod is working on getting the registration to work properly. The register page is offline, but I doubt the rest of the site is.
Welp my nation is on the brink of collapse ,and growth is at 3 million.
Oil price is through the bottom! Now it's a good time to buy oil.
your welcome ,but i do need funds to improve my economy it spirling downwards ,and who wants to create a new alliance?If so kethane nation is going to be the leading country.
quick guys all the oil is free.

Oil is at an all time low today with prices at 18k and going down!!!

Uranium is still rare and so very high prices!!!

EDIT: its at 16k now!
I'm hoarding oil now so that I can sell it at a higher price. Buy all you want before the price goes up and up and UP!
Crap its up to 35k, managed to buy like 10 barrels for total cost of like.... 140k?
